game.name: Sonya
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 수시 저장, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A surreal horror where your decisions and moral choices shape your destiny. Navigate a hospital, listen to the inner voices, and discover a truth that will break your mind.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A surreal horror where your decisions and moral choices shape your destiny. Navigate a hospital, listen to the inner voices, and discover a truth that will break your mind.
